## CircularDepDetector class

A utility class for detecting circular dependencies in a dependency graph.

This class maintains a graph of components and their dependencies, and provides methods to: - Register components and their dependencies - Detect circular dependencies during resolution - Generate reports and visualizations of the dependency graph - Provide resolution suggestions for circular dependencies

The detector uses a depth-first search approach to identify cycles in the dependency graph.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class CircularDepDetector 
```
